entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LATE THIS EVENING
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 70S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
